text: @SenSchumer SenSchumy,NY NURSING HOME DEATHS NOW EXCEED 5600+!ALL DUE TO GOV CUOMO’S FORCED ADMITTANCE TO NURSING HOMES-NO MATTER WHETHER PATIENT’S WERE COVID19 INFECTED OR NOT!WHY HAVEN’T YOU AS THE SENATE MINORITY LEADER CALLED FOR INVESTIGATIONS OF GOV CUOMO’S NURSING HOME POLICIES?
